message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price!
I appreciate the offer, but $120 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to go down to $90?
I can see you're a serious buyer, but I need to make a profit. I can meet you halfway between $90 and $120, so I'll offer you the product for $110.
I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $110 is still a bit too high for my budget. I'm willing to go up to $105. What do you think?

I'm getting close to meeting your budget, but I still need to make a profit. I can offer you a slight discount, so I'll meet you at $105, but I'll throw in a small bonus to sweeten the deal. I'll sell the product to you for $107.50
